## ListenerOptions.group property

Sets the string used to group listeners together for scaling purposes.

This defaults to an incrementing numeric ID, though this can cause race conditions for code that asynchronously creates listeners.

If this is the case, set the group here for safety.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
group?: string;
```
